verses.verse: וַיְשִׁבֵנִי֮ <S%H7725><s%> vay-shi-ve-Ni Afterward he brought me again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach unto the door הַבַּיִת֒ <S%H1004><s%> hab-ba-Yit of the house וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- and behold מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim and behold waters יֹצְאִ֗ים <S%H3318><s%> yo-tze-'Im, issued out מִתַּ֨חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat under מִפְתַּ֤ן <S%H4670><s%> mif-Tan from under the threshold הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house קָדִ֔ימָה <S%H6921><s%> ka-Di-mah, eastward כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for פְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> fe-Nei for the forefront הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house קָדִ֑ים <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim; [stood toward] the east וְהַמַּ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> ve-ham-Ma-yim and the waters יֹרְדִ֗ים <S%H3381><s%> yo-re-Dim, came down מִתַּ֜חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat under מִכֶּ֤תֶף <S%H3802><s%> mik-Ke-tef side הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house הַיְמָנִ֔ית <S%H3233><s%> hay-ma-Nit, from under from the right מִנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> min-Ne-gev at the south לַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> lam-miz-Be-ach. [side] of the altar

וַיּוֹצִאֵנִי֮ <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-tzi-'e-Ni Then brought he me out דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> de-rech- of the way שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar of the gate צָפוֹנָה֒ <S%H6828><s%> tza-fo-Nah northward וַיְסִבֵּ֙נִי֙ <S%H5437><s%> vay-sib-Be-ni and led me about דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech the way ח֔וּץ <S%H2351><s%> Chutz, without unto the utter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate הַח֔וּץ <S%H2351><s%> ha-Chutz, to the outer דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech by the way הַפּוֹנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> hap-po-Neh that looketh קָדִ֑ים <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim; eastward וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- and behold מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim waters מְפַכִּ֔ים <S%H6349><s%> me-fak-Kim, unstable מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַכָּתֵ֖ף <S%H3802><s%> hak-ka-Tef side הַיְמָנִֽית׃ <S%H3233><s%> hay-ma-Nit. on the right

בְּצֵאת־ <S%H3318><s%> be-tzet- went forth הָאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish And when the man קָדִ֖ים <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim eastward וְקָ֣ו <S%H6957><s%> ve-Kav that had the line בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do; in his hand וַיָּ֤מָד <S%H4058><s%> vai-Ya-mod he measured אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> 'e-lef a thousand בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah, cubits וַיַּעֲבִרֵ֥נִי <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'a-vi-Re-ni and he brought me through בַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> vam-Ma-yim the waters מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> mei the waters אָפְסָֽיִם׃ <S%H657><s%> 'a-fe-Sa-yim. [were] to the ankles

וַיָּ֣מָד <S%H4058><s%> vai-Ya-mod Again he measured אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, a thousand וַיַּעֲבִרֵ֥נִי <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'a-vi-Re-ni and brought me through בַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> vam-Ma-yim the waters מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim the waters בִּרְכָּ֑יִם <S%H1290><s%> bir-Ka-yim; [were] to the knees וַיָּ֣מָד <S%H4058><s%> vai-Ya-mod Again he measured אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, a thousand וַיַּעֲבִרֵ֖נִי <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'a-vi-Re-ni and brought me through מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> mei the waters מָתְנָֽיִם׃ <S%H4975><s%> ma-te-Na-yim. [were] to the loins

וַיָּ֣מָד <S%H4058><s%> vai-Ya-mod Afterward he measured אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, a thousand נַ֕חַל <S%H5158><s%> Na-chal [and it was] a river אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not אוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> 'u-Chal that I could לַעֲבֹ֑ר <S%H5674><s%> la-'a-Vor; not pass over כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גָא֤וּ <S%H1342><s%> ga-'U were risen הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim for the waters מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> mei waters שָׂ֔חוּ <S%H7813><s%> Sa-chu, to swim in נַ֖חַל <S%H5158><s%> Na-chal a river אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- could יֵעָבֵֽר׃ <S%H5674><s%> ye-'a-Ver. that could not be passed over

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai have you הֲרָאִ֣יתָ <S%H7200><s%> ha-ra-'I-ta hast thou seen בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- unto me Son אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam; of man וַיּוֹלִכֵ֥נִי <S%H1980><s%> vai-yo-li-Che-ni he וַיְשִׁבֵ֖נִי <S%H7725><s%> vay-shi-Ve-ni me and caused me to return שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> se-Fat to the brink הַנָּֽחַל׃ <S%H5158><s%> han-Na-chal. of the river

בְּשׁוּבֵ֕נִי <S%H7725><s%> be-shu-Ve-ni Now when I had returned וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on שְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> se-Fat behold at the bank הַנַּ֔חַל <S%H5158><s%> han-Na-chal, of the river עֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz trees רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> rav many מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; [were] very מִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh the one וּמִזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> u-miz-Zeh. side

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, toward הַמַּ֤יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim he unto me These waters הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh These יוֹצְאִ֗ים <S%H3318><s%> yotz-'Im, issue out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward הַגְּלִילָה֙ <S%H1552><s%> hag-ge-li-Lah country הַקַּדְמוֹנָ֔ה <S%H6930><s%> hak-kad-mo-Nah, toward the east וְיָרְד֖וּ <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-re-Du and go down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- into הָֽעֲרָבָ֑ה <S%H6160><s%> ha-'a-ra-Vah; into the desert וּבָ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-'u and go הַיָּ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam-mah, into the sea אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward הַיָּ֥מָּה <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam-mah into the sea הַמּֽוּצָאִ֖ים <S%H3318><s%> ham-mu-tza-'Im [which being] brought forth; וְנִרְפְּאוּ ve-nir-pe-'u כוְנִרְפּ֥וּ <S%H7495><s%> ve-nir-Pu cure קהַמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim. the waters

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will come כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol every נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh And it shall come to pass [that] every thing חַיָּ֣ה׀ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yah that liveth אֲ‍ ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'asher- which יִשְׁרֹ֡ץ <S%H8317><s%> yish-Rotz which moveth אֶ֣ל <S%H413><s%> 'el in כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יָב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo shall come שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there נַחֲלַ֙יִם֙ <S%H5158><s%> na-cha-La-yim whithersoever the rivers יִֽחְיֶ֔ה <S%H2421><s%> yich-Yeh, shall live וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will come הַדָּגָ֖ה <S%H1710><s%> had-da-Gah multitude of fish רַבָּ֣ה <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bah great מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; and there shall be a very כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki for בָ֨אוּ <S%H935><s%> Va-'u shall come שָׁ֜מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there הַמַּ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim because these waters הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these וְיֵרָֽפְאוּ֙ <S%H7495><s%> ve-ye-ra-fe-'U thither for they shall be healed וָחָ֔י <S%H2425><s%> va-Chai, and every thing shall live כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> kol everything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יָ֥בוֹא <S%H935><s%> Ya-Vo cometh שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there הַנָּֽחַל׃ <S%H5158><s%> han-Na-chal. whither the river

וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will come; יַעַמְדוּ ya-'am-du כעָמְד֨וּ <S%H5975><s%> 'a-me-Du abide קעָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav beside דַּוָּגִ֗ים <S%H1728><s%> dav-va-Gim, And it shall come to pass [that] the fishers מֵעֵ֥ין me-'Ein גֶּ֙דִי֙ <S%H5872><s%> ge-di upon it from Engedi וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against עֵ֣ין 'ein עֶגְלַ֔יִם <S%H5882><s%> 'eg-La-yim, even unto Eneglaim מִשְׁט֥וֹחַ <S%H4894><s%> mish-To-ach they shall be a [place] to spread forth לַֽחֲרָמִ֖ים <S%H2764><s%> la-cha-ra-Mim nets יִהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu; will come לְמִינָה֙ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-Nah shall be according to their kinds תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh will come דְגָתָ֔ם <S%H1710><s%> de-ga-Tam, their fish כִּדְגַ֛ת <S%H1710><s%> kid-Gat as the fish הַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol of the great רַבָּ֥ה <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bah many מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. exceeding

בִּצֹּאתֹו bitz-tzo-tov כבִּצֹּאתָ֧יו <S%H1207><s%> bitz-tzo-Tav swamp קוּגְבָאָ֛יו <S%H1360><s%> u-ge-va-'Av thereof and the marishes וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo will not יֵרָפְא֖וּ <S%H7495><s%> ye-ra-fe-'U thereof shall not be healed לְמֶ֥לַח <S%H4417><s%> le-Me-lach to salt נִתָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H5414><s%> nit-Ta-nu. they shall be given

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- By הַנַּ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> han-Na-chal And by the river יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh thereof on this side and on that side shall grow עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on שְׂפָת֣וֹ <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-To upon the bank מִזֶּ֣ה׀ <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh one וּמִזֶּ֣ה׀ <S%H2088><s%> u-miz-Zeh side כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עֵֽץ־ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz- all trees מַ֠אֲכָל <S%H3978><s%> Ma-'a-chol for meat לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will not יִבּ֨וֹל <S%H5034><s%> yib-Bol shall not fade עָלֵ֜הוּ <S%H5929><s%> 'a-Le-hu whose leaf וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- will not יִתֹּ֣ם <S%H8552><s%> yit-Tom thereof be consumed פִּרְי֗וֹ <S%H6529><s%> pir-Yo, neither shall the fruit לָֽחֳדָשָׁיו֙ <S%H2320><s%> lo-cho-da-Shav according to his months יְבַכֵּ֔ר <S%H1069><s%> ye-vak-Ker, it shall bring forth new fruit כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because מֵימָ֔יו <S%H4325><s%> mei-Mav, because their waters מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַמִּקְדָּ֖שׁ <S%H4720><s%> ham-mik-Dash of the sanctuary הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah like יֽוֹצְאִ֑ים <S%H3318><s%> yotz-'Im; they issued out; וְהָיוּ ve-ha-yu כוְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become קפִרְיוֹ֙ <S%H6529><s%> fir-Yo and the fruit לְמַֽאֲכָ֔ל <S%H3978><s%> le-ma-'a-Chal, thereof shall be for meat וְעָלֵ֖הוּ <S%H5929><s%> ve-'a-Le-hu and the leaf לִתְרוּפָֽה׃ <S%H8644><s%> lit-ru-Fah. thereof for medicine ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD גֵּ֤ה <S%H1454><s%> geh This גְבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul [shall be] the border אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּתְנַחֲל֣וּ <S%H5157><s%> tit-na-cha-Lu whereby ye shall inherit אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, the land לִשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> lish-Nei two עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> shiv-Tei tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef Joseph חֲבָלִֽים׃ <S%H2256><s%> cha-va-Lim. [shall have two] portions

וּנְחַלְתֶּ֤ם <S%H5157><s%> u-ne-chal-Tem And ye shall inherit אוֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish it one כְּאָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> ke-'a-Chiv, as well as another אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָשָׂ֙אתִי֙ <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa-ti [concerning] the which I lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di, mine hand לְתִתָּ֖הּ <S%H5414><s%> le-tit-Tah to give לַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-tei-Chem; it unto your fathers וְנָ֨פְלָ֜ה <S%H5307><s%> ve-Na-fe-Lah shall fall הָאָ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz and this land הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot likewise לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem בְּנַחֲלָֽה׃ <S%H5159><s%> be-na-cha-Lah. unto you for inheritance

וְזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh This גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul And this [shall be] the border הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the land לִפְאַ֨ת <S%H6285><s%> lif-'At side צָפ֜וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah toward the north מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַיָּ֧ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam sea הַגָּד֛וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol from the great הַדֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> had-De-rech the way חֶתְלֹ֖ן <S%H2855><s%> chet-Lon of Hethlon לְב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> le-Vo as men go צְדָֽדָה׃ <S%H6657><s%> tze-Da-dah. to Zedad

חֲמָ֤ת׀ <S%H2574><s%> cha-Mat Hamath בֵּר֙וֹתָה֙ <S%H1268><s%> be-Ro-tah Berothah סִבְרַ֔יִם <S%H5453><s%> siv-Ra-yim, Sibraim אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> bein- is between גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul which [is] between the border דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> dam-Me-sek, of Damascus וּבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein is between גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul and the border חֲמָ֑ת <S%H2574><s%> cha-Mat; of Hamath חָצֵר֙ cha-Tzer הַתִּיכ֔וֹן <S%H2694><s%> hat-ti-Chon, Hazarhatticon אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul which [is] by the coast חַוְרָֽן׃ <S%H2362><s%> chav-Ran. of Hauran
